question: Who has been appointed as the president of the 36th International Geological Congress (IGC - 2020)?
explanation: Scientist Dr Vijay Prasad Dimri has been appointed as the president of the 36th International Geological Congress (IGC), a global platform for the advancement of earth science, to be held in New Delhi from March 2 -8, 2020. He succeeded Shailesh Nayak.
